# gsm.pd: Protocol Deviations Plugin

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

gsm.pd provides Shiny modules and a plugin for use in apps created with [{gsm.app}](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app).

## Installation

::: {.pkgdown-release}
You can install the latest release of gsm.pd from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("OpenRBQM/gsm.pd@*release‚Å†")
```
:::
::: {.pkgdown-devel}
You can install the development version of gsm.pd from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("OpenRBQM/gsm.pd")
```
:::
